MongoInt64::__construct

(PECL mongo >= 1.0.9)

MongoInt64::__construct — Creates a new 64-bit integer.

Description

public MongoInt64::__construct ( string $value )

Creates a new 64-bit number with the given value.

Parameters

value

A number.

Return Values

Returns a new integer.
